title: Jacqueline Woodson On Growing Up, Coming Out And Saying Hi To Strangers
teaser: Woodson, the author of the young adult novel Brown Girl Dreaming, says that growing up in South Carolina, she knew that the safest place was with her family. Originally broadcast Dec. 10, 2014.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
